selectShortcuts.title: Select Shortcuts
selectShortcuts.description: Search for Shortcuts to select which will be processed

editSnippets.title: Edit Snippets
editSnippets.description: Edit your saved Snippets and clipboard items

help.title: Help
help.description: If you are lost, start here

confirmSelectedShortcuts.shortcutsSizeLarge:
The selected shortcuts are quite large ($size). The Shortcuts app or Safari may crash if too much data is transferred.
Do you want to continue?
confirmSelectedShortcuts.shortcutsLoaded:
All selected shortcuts are already loaded.
Do you want to continue and use them or reload them?

openApp.returningToMainMenuIn: Returning to Main Menu in $seconds s

processShortcuts.noItemsFound:
No snippets or inserts were found.
Please check, if you have the correct syntax in the comment actions.

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.noItemsFound: No further snippets or inserts found.
warnings.incomplete: Found an incomplete CopyPaste Actions comment.
warnings.wrongFunction:
Wrong function name.
Expected one of $functionDefinition, but got "$function" instead.
warnings.pauseResumeInPaste: Found "$function" in a paste replace range, which is not supported.
warnings.pauseResumeInInsert: Found "$function" in an insert replace range, which is not supported.
warnings.duplicateClipboardNoName: There is already a clipboard item without a name.
warnings.duplicateClipboardWithName: There is already a clipboard item with the name "$name".
warnings.duplicateSnippetNoName: There is already a snippet without a name.
warnings.duplicateSnippetWithName: There is already a snippet with the name "$name".
warnings.pasteEndNoStart: Found the end of a paste replace section without any start.
warnings.insertEndNoStart: Found the end of an insert replace section without any start.
warnings.pasteEndInsertStart: Found the end of a paste replace section without any start. Maybe you meant "end insert"?
warnings.insertEndPasteStart: Found the end of an insert replace section without any start. Maybe you meant "end paste"?
warnings.funcNoStart:
Found "$function" without any start.
Maybe you specified a number after the start function e.g. "copy 5" to copy only the next 5 actions and forgot to remove this comment, or there was an error with the start comment, or you forgot to specify "end paste" or "end insert" to end a paste/an insert range, or you forgot to specify the name of the clipboard item/snippet.
warnings.funcClipboardFinished:
Found "$function" after the clipboard item has already finished.
Maybe you've specified a count on the start function (e.g. "copy 5") that finished before reaching the current function.
warnings.funcSnippetFinished:
Found "$function" after the snippet has already finished.
Maybe you've specified a count on the start function (e.g. "save 5") that finished before reaching the current function.
warnings.pauseWhilePauseClipboard: Found function "pause" while current clipboard item is already paused.
warnings.pauseWhilePauseSnippet: Found function "pause" while current snippet is already paused.
warnings.resumeWhileResumeClipboard: Found function "resume" while current clipboard item is already continuing.
warnings.resumeWhileResumeSnippet: Found function "resume" while current snippet is already continuing.

foundSnippets.title: Found Snippets
foundSnippets.noSnippetsFound: No Snippets or Clipboard Items found
foundSnippets.resolveConflicts: Please resolve the conflicts shown at the top before continuing
foundSnippets.finishEditing: You have started editing a snippet or clipboard item. Please save or cancle your edits before continuing

normal.clipboard: This overrides the following clipboard item:

subjunctive.clipboard: This would override the following clipboard item:
subjunctive.snippet: This would override the following snippet:

inserts.clipboard: This will insert the following clipboard item:
inserts.snippet: This will insert the following snippet:
